title: The Highway of steel
creator_credit: Ralph McCromick, Harold Goodwin and Gaumont-British Instructional
brief_description: Emphasises the part played by the British Railways in the production of steel in Great Britain. How iron ore, coke for smelting, and limestone for steel manufacture are transported to the steel works. Follows the production of steel from pig iron to the finished product.
creator_credit_for_label: Ralph McCromick, Harold Goodwin and Gaumont-British Instructional
